### Chart C

```{r}
attendance_count = dataset %>% group_by(`Are you currently attending University / College?`) %>% count()
```

```{r}
renderPlot({
  attendance_count = dataset %>% group_by(!!input$Id) %>% count()
    ggplot(data = attendance_count, aes(x = n, y = !!input$Id )) + 
    geom_line(color = "red") +
    geom_point() 
  })
```
